keys: dimensión de una variable del diente

    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_79502</entry>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_79502</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Special teeth structure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spezielle Zahnstruktur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Structure spéciale de dents</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estrutura especial dos dentes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Struttura speciale dei denti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ειδική δομή δοντιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estructura especial de los dientes</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates how the shape of a cutting tool is essential to its function. The incisors that cut food up into smaller pieces have a similar structure to the chisel.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chisel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cutting tool</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">incisors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tooth shape</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie die Form eines 
Ausschnitthilfsmittels zu seiner Funktion wesentlich ist. Die 
Schneiden, die Nahrung oben in kleinere Stücke schneiden, haben eine 
ähnliche Struktur zum Meißel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre comment la forme 
d'un outil de coupe est essentielle à sa fonction. Les 
incisives qui coupent la nourriture vers le haut en plus petits 
morceaux ont une structure semblable au burin.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra como a forma de uma 
ferramenta de corte é essencial a sua função. Os incisors que
cortam o alimento acima em partes menores têm uma estrutura similar 
ao formão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra come la figura di un
utensile per il taglio è essenziale alla relativa funzione. Gli
incisivi che tagliano l'alimento in su in più piccole parti hanno una
struttura simile allo scalpello.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει πώς η μορφή ενός 
τέμνοντος εργαλείου είναι ουσιαστική στη λειτουργία της. Τα
incisors που κόβουν τα τρόφιμα επάνω στα μικρότερα κομμάτια 
έχουν μια παρόμοια δομή στη σμίλη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra cómo la dimensión 
de una variable de una herramienta de corte es esencial para su 
función. Las incisivos que cortan el alimento para arriba en 
pedazos más pequeños tienen una estructura similar al cincel.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Meißel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausschnitthilfsmittel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schneiden</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zahnform</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">utensile per il taglio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-it">figura del dente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
